pull.title: tests: Use MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE from script.py
pull.body: `p2p_segwit.py` and `test_framework/script.py` both define a constant for `MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE` (=520 bytes), which is redundant.  This change uses the constant defined in the `script.py` module for `p2p_segwit.py`.

events.message:
tests: Use MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE from script.py

p2p_segwit.py and test_framework/script.py both define a constant for
MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE (=520 bytes), which is redundant.  This change
uses the constant defined in the script.py module for p2p_segwit.py.

events.body: Note that there are two more places in `p2p_segwit.py` that use the literal constant 520 - but they just use the max script element size to build up large scripts for testing size limits.  So there the number is not used explicitly as the "max script element size" so I left it untouched (especially since there some precise calculations of byte sizes are used, so the exact number matters).

issue.title: commits from bitcoin/master
issue.body:
Change gitian-descriptors to use bionic instead
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13171

Trivial: fix references to share/rpcuser (now share/rpcauth)
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13664

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13652

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13298

Initialize m_next_send_inv_to_incoming
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13679

Add depends 32-bit arm support for bitcoin-qt
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13604

tests: Avoid read/write to default datadir
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13663

bench: Remove unused variable
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13682

Add scantxoutset RPC method
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12196

https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13647

[doc] Remove outdated comment about miner ignoring CPFP
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13680

tests: Use MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE from script.py
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13638

Migrate gitian-build.sh to python

[moveonly] Extract MakeUnique into utilmemory.h

contrib: Clone core repo in gitian-build

contrib: correct version check

Modified in_addr6 cast in CConman class to work with msvc
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13672

travis: Check that ~/.bitcoin is never created
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13687

doc: Add release notes for -printtoconsole and -debuglogfile changes
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13625

bitcoinconsensus: invalid flags error should be set to bitcoinconsensus_err
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13655

BIP 174 PSBT Serializations and RPCs
